CustomField.description: Use the Inactivate Registrations tab on the program to inactivate bulk contacts. Or inactivate individual contacts by checking this checkbox. Or delete registration records to permanently remove a registered contact from the Manage Attendance tab. Note: This box is checked via when a participant is inactivated by the ManageRegistrations Lightning component (using the Inactivate Registrations tab on the program). It is automatically unchecked if a Program Attendance record is subsequently created for the participant. Inactive registrations still appear on the Manage Attendance tab on sessions, but at the end of the list. Note: Inactivating or deleting registrations does NOT affect attendance records. Note: Registration records link contacts with sessions to produce the list on the Manage Attendance tab on sessions (to facilitate bulk attendance data entry).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use the Inactivate Registrations tab on program to inactivate registrations in bulk. Or inactivate individually by checking this checkbox. Or delete registration records to permanently remove a registered contact from the Manage Attendance tab.
CustomField.label: Inactive
